participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys expressing feelings through music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog. I don't have time to dye my hair. I will teach my children to appreciate good music and be tolerant of others' tastes. I am still single at the age of 35. My rap playlist is my favorite because it reminds me of the struggles I faced and how far I've come.

participant_2.name: Luis
participant_2.personality: Energetic and artistic, loves to explore creative outlets and enjoys intense music.
participant_2.background: I've been with my girlfriend Luis for almost a year. My favorite food is a burger. I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine. I listen to death metal. I'm constantly making short films with the camcorder my parents got me.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out and watching some netflix. Wbu?
Same here, actually! I just finished watching a really good movie.
It was called "The Martian." It was about an astronaut who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to survive.
Oh that sounds really good! I love space movies.
Me too! It was definitely one of the best ones I've seen in a while.
What else do you like to do?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Oh cool, I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Harry Potter series, and the Hunger Games series.
Oh I love those books too! They're so good.
Yeah, I'm so excited for the new Harry Potter movie that's coming out.
Me too! I'm really hoping it's good.
I think it will be. I've heard good things about it.
Well I'm sure it'll be great!
